MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the postcode area of Thornliebank, affecting properties in Capelrig Street and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to complete a safe repair on damaged piece of electrical equipment on Drumpark Street, we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.00PM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.05PM on 21 November 2020.
